com.mapquest.android.maps
Interface MapView.MapViewEventListener

Enclosing class:
MapView
public static interface MapView.MapViewEventListener

MapViewEventListeners are a simple way to detect changes in the map state in your code. Add one of these to the mapView if you are interested in map events.

Method Summary
 void longTouch(MapView mapView)
          Touch was a long touch
 void mapLoaded(MapView mapView)
          Fired once the map is loaded and ready to go.

          The map is ending a zoom
